dcterms:creator: X. Wang
J. Yamagishi
M. Todisco
H. Delgado
A. Nautsch
N. Evans
dcterms:description: The ASVspoof 2019 Logical Access (LA) database is used for training the spoofing countermeasure (CM) and automatic speaker verification (ASV) systems, containing data collected from 20 speakers.
dcterms:title: ASVspoof 2019 Logical Access (LA)

dcterms:creator: H. Ma
J. Yi
C. Wang
X. Yan
J. Tao
T. Wang
S. Wang
L. Xu
R. Fu
dcterms:description: The Fake Audio Detection (FAD) database contains bona fide and spoofed Mandarin-language utterances generated using TTS algorithms, sourced from multiple public databases.
dcterms:title: Fake Audio Detection (FAD)

dcterms:creator: J. S. Chung
A. Nagrani
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: The VoxCeleb2 database is used for automatic speaker verification (ASV) pre-training, containing a large number of speaker recordings.
dcterms:title: VoxCeleb2
